entry.title: Old news
entry.content:
February 20th, 2012

Tech Demo (vimeo) integrating Nuance speech technologies into the next generation of WholeSlide core technology.

December 19th, 2011

Released “Cognitive Consilience” in collaboration with Soren Solari – a comprehensive review of cortical neuroanatomy. UCSD posting.

December 1st, /2011

We are pleased to announce a partnership with Aperio Technologies, Inc and look forward to providing tools to the next generation of digital pathologists.

October 11th, 2011

Version 1.05 has been pushed to the app store, addressing minor bugs and adding support for the OpenConnectome datasets. Available on the App Store (free)

entry.title: The blog is alive
entry.content: This blog will house the updates for the open source project along with any collaborations.
